# Syntactic Analysis
- concerned with the construction of sentences.
- Syntactic structure indicates how the words are related to each other
- Syntax tree is assigned by a grammer and a [Lexicon](Lexicon.qmd)
- [Context Free Grammar](Context%20Free%20Grammar.qmd)
